name: Jet Ski Beat
description:
Controls, and How To Play:

Use the A,W,S,D keys to move! 

Avoid enemies, position accordingly, and gather power-ups to last as long as possible!

Developed by DallaswithaD

Fish Sprites by Nimyu

Concept Help by MentalUntilDawn

Music and SFX by Danny Boi Kamstra

Inspired by Crypt of the Necrodancer and Vampire Survivors!

Made for West Jam 7, a game jam with the theme of Lake.
